name: Aspect Arcade
description:
Aspect Arcade is a strange place. Go from sober to somber in an empty barcade and pass the time with any of the three haunted arcade games. Aspect Arcade features a 1-bit black and white aesthetic and a dreamy chiptune soundtrack (the bartender found the cassette near the train tracks).

GHOST CRUISERS - You pilot a ship to collect valuables in the void, as the ghosts of your greed emerge from the darkness to follow in your wake.  TOWER OF HEL - A balancing act and exercise in the buddhist principles of rebirth, accept that you will fall. Don't give up, but don't get confident.  DARK DECK - A dungeon themed twist on solitaire, take on the 20 deadly monsters in the depths. Take up your sword and shield and face the cowardly beasts as they attack and retreat.

For those brave souls who search their dream for the strength to succeed; secret wonders await you in the physical world.

Note: if you want to play in a larger resolution, download the Windows installer!

Check out the Patreon for this new and ongoing project!

-- Aspect MGMT
